string-array.name: event_age0
string-array.item: You are a brave warrior, born and raised in a noble family but choosing the adventurous path to fight against evil
You were born in a remote countryside, where creatures of horror abound, yet with strong determination, you rose up to fight against the demons
You are a noblewoman warrior, carrying the bloodline of royalty. Unable to bear the oppression of the demons, you set out on a quest to conquer justice
Born into a poor peasant family, yet fueled by boundless love and fortified by unwavering determination, you are on the path to becoming a strong warrior woman

You wander in the forest and are chased by a bear
You are lost in the forest
You step into a trap
You learn a new skill

You spend the entire day running
